trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Joliet
There were no other sightings in Joliet on or around August 15th 1987
divs: Sighting Detailson a Thursday night out of Bible class, we were on our way home in my mothers car, brother and sister and a friend of my mothers, and I always had a habit of looking out the back window of the car, an 1974 Brown Chrysler Newport, we left out of the church and headed down Collins to go to Jackson St, and as I looked out the window, it was there, like it appered out of nowhere...made no noise, no propeller, but was well lit up, with changing colors of its lights and it hung low in the clear night sky...everyone figured it to be a blimp or some fancy projection, but I'm sure it was a UFO..I wasn't scared though, I was amazed at it, and I never told nobody this until now, for they would figure it to be a blimp or something, and I since never saw it again...and I wonder if it had affected me in some way, cause I now come up with so many ideas, including finding a flaw in the now 60-year old hypersonic engine program...I know NASA, DARPA, and espically the Air Force was shocked at it, and the odd thing is I never saw this thing before in my life, but I knew it was designed wrong
Summary: changing lights, hovered over Joliet for about 30 minutes
